channel.title: Politics on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Blowfish

item.title: How to Understand Government Systems
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description: You cannot understand anything without your questions. Books, interviews, newspapers, and podcasts are boring if you are not interested in the subject and don’t have any questions. Whether you know the answer or get the answer or understand the answer or dont’s understand that all is secondary. To explore something, you must have some questions.

item.title: PM Modi's Response on 75 years of Republic of India - Dec 2024
item.author: nuno@n9o.xyz (Blowfish)
item.description:
PM Modi’s Response on 75 years of Republic of India - Dec 2024

These notes are from PM Narendra Modi’s addresses on the occasion of special discussion on 75th anniversary of adoption of Constitution in Lok Sabha.
